DefaultReaderConfiguration.description: Trend Micro Interscan Gateway Security Appliance
DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Trend Micros Interscan Gateway Security appliances.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastToolId.description: Trend Micro Interscan Gateway Security Appliance

FastFormatter.condition: Update: ActiveUpdate was unable to connect.*
67108865: Update success\. +(.+) has been changed from.*
67108865: Update: ActiveUpdate was unable to connect to the network\. .+ \((.*)\) *
67108865: Update success\..+ has been changed from [\w.]+ to ([\w.]+).*
67108865: Update success\..+ has been changed from ([\w.]+) to .*
